ValidationRule.description: If the Request Type equals "Port", then the following fields are required. Data Type, Data Details, Notes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "GDPR Customer Request Record Type", ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, "Port"), ISNULL(Data_Type__c) || ISNULL(Data_Details__c)|| ISNULL(Requested_Notes__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Request Type is "Port", then the Data Type, Data Details and Notes fields are required.
